channel.title: Help meh will ++rep
channel.description:
Alright, my problem is that i can't seem to get my webclient online, i think it may because of port forwarding.. i change the port it connect to on the client and the source to 43593 (default is 43594) because i had a feeling a program was stopping it from working. I was wondering if someone could help me by trying to get it online themselves so i can know if its port forwarding or if its a problem with the source/client.
I started to build my server from the released "CreativeScape" server base (so if there are any known errors with the base can you please tell me)
Add me on MSN "Mattz_strong@hotmail.com" if you want the server files to check if its my port forwarding, otherwise leave a comment telling me what you think might be wrong and i'll check back on this post every 10-20 mins.
Thanks :]
P.S. I am pretty sure its my port forwarding failness (I've had normal clients up before, never a webclient though).

item.title: Help meh will ++rep
item.dc:creator: @rosejuice rosejuice
